Package com.jackmeng.tailwind

Interface Audio

All Known Implementing Classes:
TailwindPlayer
public interface Audio
An interface that provides implementation for Audio creation to the BigContainer Player classes. This interface template does not provide every single method that a player might need; thus, the programmer must implement their own styles and methods to be used along. An example of this implementation is TailwindPlayer
Since:
3.1
Author:
Jack Meng
See Also:
